item.title: Virt Manager
item.description: 环境 ➜ ~ cat /etc/os-release PRETTY_NAME="Ubuntu 22.04.3 LTS" NAME="Ubuntu" VERSION_ID="22.04" VERSION="22.04.3 LTS (Jammy Jellyfish)" VERSION_CODENAME=jammy ID=ubuntu ID_LIKE=debian HOME_URL="https://www.ubuntu.com/" SUPPORT_URL="https://help.ubuntu.com/" BUG_REPORT_URL="https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/" PRIVACY_POLICY_URL="https://www.ubuntu.com/legal/terms-and-policies/privacy-policy" UBUNTU_CODENAME=jammy 安装配置 安装 sudo apt install virt-manager qemu bridge-utils -y 修改libvirtd配置文件并重启 sudo vim /etc/libvirt/qemu.conf - #user = "root" + user = "gobai" - #group = "root" + group = "gobai" sudo systemctl restart libvirtd 启动 virt-manager sudo virt-manager 运行 openwrt 现有镜像文件在Documents目录下 ➜ Documents ls -lh total 855M -rw-r--r-- 1 gobai gobai 855M 9月 23 23:06 openwrt-x86-64-generic-ext4-combined-efi.
